detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DKPP2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKPP2.sol#101-223) has payable functions:
	 - DKPP2.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKPP2.sol#211-213)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
